External Link: https://www.deftdocs.bbn.com/Shared Documents/MyHTML5/default.htm - Algorithms/Document Relations/ReVerb Relation Extractor.htm
Description: Automatically identifies and extracts binary relationships from English sentences. Relations are lexical, i.e. they consist of a predicate (verb phrase) and its two noun phrase arguments.

External Link: https://www.deftdocs.bbn.com/Shared Documents/MyHTML5/default.htm - Algorithms/Document Relations/OLLIE Relation Extractor.htm
Description: Extracts relations among sentences. Relations are lexical, i.e. the consist of a predicate and arguments as in 1.1 and also include lexical information about attribution and the enabling condition.
License: Apache 2.0, MIT, New BSD, http://www.maltparser.org/license.html, In house

External Link: https://www.deftdocs.bbn.com/Shared Documents/MyHTML5/default.htm - Algorithms/Document Relations/UMass Universal Schema Relation Extraction.htm
Description: Extracts relations between entities in a large document collection. Relations are drawn from an ontology (e.g. attendedSchool).

External Link: https://www.deftdocs.bbn.com/Shared Documents/MyHTML5/default.htm - Algorithms/Coreference/UMass Within-document Coreference.htm
Description: Identifies coreferences (group of equivalent items) within a document. Coreference is currently performed only for selected Entity types.

Software: Cross Document Coreference with Resolution to Knowledge Base(KB)
External Link: https://www.deftdocs.bbn.com/Shared Documents/MyHTML5/default.htm - Algorithms/Coreference/UMass Cross document with resolution to KB.htm
Description: Identifies coreferences (group of equivalent items) within a document and resolves the coreferences with a KB. Coreference is currently performed for People and Organizations.

Software: Bayesian Logic Programs for Textual Inference
External Link: https://www.deftdocs.bbn.com/Shared Documents/MyHTML5/default.htm - Algorithms/Document Relations/Bayesian Logic Problems for Textual Inference.htm
Description: Infers new relations based on given set of relations and documents. Relations are drawn from an ontology (e.g. attendedSchool).

Software: Labeled N-Ary Relations between Typed Text Spans
External Link: https://www.deftdocs.bbn.com/Shared Documents/MyHTML5/default.htm - Algorithms/Document Relations/CUNY's Labeled N Ary Relations Between Typed Text Spans.htm
Description: Extracts (binary) relations from the document. Relations are drawn from an ontology (e.g. attendedSchool).
License: GPL, LGPL, BSD, Apache, MIT, CPL, SUN

Software: Speech Segmentation (Prosodic Analysis for Anomaly Analysis)
External Link: https://www.deftdocs.bbn.com/Shared Documents/MyHTML5/default.htm - Algorithms/Speech/Speech Segmentation (Prosodic Analysis for Anomaly Analysis).htm
Description: Assigns segmentation at the level of sentences, prosodic phrases or discourse units as an ordered list of start time-end time pairs.

Software: Anomaly Analysis (Prosodic Analysis for Anomaly Analysis)
External Link: https://www.deftdocs.bbn.com/Shared Documents/MyHTML5/default.htm - Algorithms/Speech/Anomaly Analysis (Prosodic Analysis for Anomaly Analysis).htm
Description: Annotates speech segment with confidence values denoting how uncertain the speaker is or how novel the information contained in the unit is.

External Link: https://www.deftdocs.bbn.com/Shared Documents/MyHTML5/default.htm - Algorithms/Sentiment Social Context and Aspect/Modality-CB Tagger.htm
Description: Tags the modality of predicates (verbs) into one of six classes (ability, effort, intention, success, want, belief) and for those of the speaker/author of the text toward each proposition in the text.
License: InHouse, ASL, CPL, EPL, LGPL, GPL, BSD, MIT

External Link: https://www.deftdocs.bbn.com/Shared Documents/MyHTML5/default.htm - Algorithms/Sentiment Social Context and Aspect/Sarcasm Detection.htm
Description: Judges whether a sentence is sarcastic or not.

External Link: https://www.deftdocs.bbn.com/Shared Documents/MyHTML5/default.htm - Algorithms/Speech/Interaction Acoustic Analysis.htm
Description: Generates a list of acoustic/prosodic characteristics from the input.

External Link: https://www.deftdocs.bbn.com/Shared Documents/MyHTML5/default.htm - Algorithms/Sentiment Social Context and Aspect/Opinion.htm
Description: Tags phrases in sentences for subjectivity and polarity.
License: GPL, ASL, Apache,  BSD, In house

External Link: https://www.deftdocs.bbn.com/Shared Documents/MyHTML5/default.htm - Algorithms/Document Relations/Social Event Extraction.htm
Description: Labels interaction events and their participants. There are at least two types: Interaction and Cognition.

Software: Cross Document Co-reference of Relations and Entities
External Link: https://www.deftdocs.bbn.com/Shared Documents/MyHTML5/default.htm - Algorithms/Joint Coreference and Relations/Cross Document Co-reference of Relations and Entities.htm
Description: Extracts relations, entities, and co-reference information across a set of documents. Relations are drawn from an ontology (e.g. attendedSchool). The initial focus will be on people and organizations.

External Link: https://www.deftdocs.bbn.com/Shared Documents/MyHTML5/default.htm - Algorithms/Joint Coreference and Relations/CMUCS-coref-hovy-mitamura.htm
Description: Performs coreference of events (verbs and nominalizations). Coreference is typed (i.e. identity, part-of, member-of). Limited set of epistemic values attached to each event.
License: Restricted by a university license that: (a)prohibits further distribution without the new recipient signing the license, (b)prohibits commercialization, and (c)protects the source organization, CMU and USC, from lawsuits.

External Link: https://www.deftdocs.bbn.com/Shared Documents/MyHTML5/default.htm - Algorithms/Novelty and Anomaly/Novelty Detection.htm
Description: Assigns either a label or a numerical score of novelty in the input stream.
License: Restricted by a university license that: (a)prohibits further distribution without the new recipient signing the license, (b)prohibits commercialization, and (c)protects the source organization, CMU and USC, from lawsuits.

Software: KB Web, Knowledge Resolver/Event Ontology Creation.htm, Event Ontology Creation
External Link: https://www.deftdocs.bbn.com/Shared Documents/MyHTML5/default.htm - Algorithms/Event Ontology, https://www.deftdocs.bbn.com/Shared Documents/MyHTML5/default.htm#Algorithms/Event Ontology, https://www.deftdocs.bbn.com/Shared Documents/MyHTML5/default.htm -
Description: Generates an ontology of possible events. Event is a list of entities, each associated with statistical distribution over associated verbs and subject/object positions relative to verb. Events also include a description of pairwise relationships between entities (e.g., coreferent or other). Per communication with the PI, this algorithm will be delayed.
License: Restricted by a university license that: (a)prohibits further distribution without the new recipient signing the license, (b)prohibits commercialization, and (c)protects the source organization, CMU and USC, from lawsuits.

Software: KB Web, Knowledge Resolver/Knowledge Resolver.htm, Knowledge Resolver
External Link: https://www.deftdocs.bbn.com/Shared Documents/MyHTML5/default.htm - Algorithms/Event Ontology, https://www.deftdocs.bbn.com/Shared Documents/MyHTML5/default.htm#Algorithms/Event Ontology, https://www.deftdocs.bbn.com/Shared Documents/MyHTML5/default.htm -
Description: Processes a document and a set of hypotheses to generate the most coherent subset of hypotheses to explain the document.
License: Restricted by a university license that: (a)prohibits further distribution without the new recipient signing the license, (b)prohibits commercialization, and (c)protects the source organization, CMU and USC, from lawsuits.

Software: KB Web, Knowledge Resolver/Knowledge Base Web Service.htm, Knowledge Base(KB) Web Service
External Link: https://www.deftdocs.bbn.com/Shared Documents/MyHTML5/default.htm - Algorithms/Event Ontology, https://www.deftdocs.bbn.com/Shared Documents/MyHTML5/default.htm#Algorithms/Event Ontology, https://www.deftdocs.bbn.com/Shared Documents/MyHTML5/default.htm -
Description: Retrieves semantic information about entities, slots, and their values. Also enables inference over the KB to determine confidence, justification, metadata, and relevant text for a given entity-slot pair.

External Link: https://www.deftdocs.bbn.com/Shared Documents/MyHTML5/default.htm - Algorithms/Paraphrase Resource/PPDB (Paraphrase Database).htm
Description: Generates a ranked list of potential paraphrases for the input.

External Link: https://www.deftdocs.bbn.com/Shared Documents/MyHTML5/default.htm - Algorithms/Paraphrase Resource/DAPPER (Domain Adapted Paraphraser).htm
Description: Generates a database of domain-specific paraphrases using the input data.

External Link: https://www.deftdocs.bbn.com/Shared Documents/MyHTML5/default.htm - Algorithms/Textual Entailment/NattyLo.htm
Description: Identifies entailment relations (entails, contradicts, unrelated, etc.) between pairs of passages.

External Link: https://www.deftdocs.bbn.com/Shared Documents/MyHTML5/default.htm - Algorithms/Textual Entailment/Recognizing Textual Entailment.htm
Description: Identifies entailment relations (entails, contradicts, unrelated, etc.) between pairs of passages or structured hypothesis and passage.
License: Covered by the Illinois/NCSA Academic Use license. This allows individuals to use our software for non-commercial purposes, but restricts commercial use.

External Link: https://www.deftdocs.bbn.com/Shared Documents/MyHTML5/default.htm - Algorithms/Document Relations/Extended Semantic Role Labeling.htm
Description: Exctracts n-ary relations within the document. Relation set is closer semantic/linguistic relations (e.g. BENEFICIARY, Arg-0).
License: Covered by the Illinois/NCSA Academic Use license. This allows individuals to use our software for non-commercial purposes, but restricts commercial use.

External Link: https://www.deftdocs.bbn.com/Shared Documents/MyHTML5/default.htm - Algorithms/Document Relations/Discourse (Within Document - Complements Coreference).htm
Description: Recognizes relations between events, where events are ESRL predicate/argument structures. Relations include CAUSE/ENABLE, PART-OF.
License: Covered by the Illinois/NCSA Academic Use license. This allows individuals to use our software for non-commercial purposes, but restricts commercial use.

External Link: https://www.deftdocs.bbn.com/Shared Documents/MyHTML5/default.htm - Algorithms/Document Relations/Wikifier.htm
Description: Identifies a coherent set of concepts of interest in a given document, based on entities/concepts in a reference collection(Wikipedia, for now). Links entities in a document to Wikipedia URLs.
License: Covered by the Illinois/NCSA Academic Use license. This allows individuals to use our software for non-commercial purposes, but restricts commercial use.

External Link: https://www.deftdocs.bbn.com/Shared Documents/MyHTML5/default.htm - Algorithms/NLP Components/POS Tagger.htm
Description: Assigns part of speech tags to words in the input document.
License: Covered by the Illinois/NCSA Academic Use license. This allows individuals to use our software for non-commercial purposes, but restricts commercial use.

External Link: https://www.deftdocs.bbn.com/Shared Documents/MyHTML5/default.htm - Algorithms/NLP Components/Chunker.htm
Description: Divides the input documents into shallow parse chunks.
License: Covered by the Illinois/NCSA Academic Use license. This allows individuals to use our software for non-commercial purposes, but restricts commercial use.

External Link: https://www.deftdocs.bbn.com/Shared Documents/MyHTML5/default.htm - Algorithms/NLP Components/Named Entity Recognizer.htm
Description: Identifies named entities in the input document.

External Link: https://www.deftdocs.bbn.com/Shared Documents/MyHTML5/default.htm - Algorithms/Coreference/Coreference (Within Document).htm
Description: Identifies coreferences in a document for both entities and verbs.
License: Covered by the Illinois/NCSA Academic Use license. This allows individuals to use our software for non-commercial purposes, but restricts commercial use.

External Link: https://www.deftdocs.bbn.com/Shared Documents/MyHTML5/default.htm - Algorithms/Joint Coreference and Relations/Profiler.htm
Description: Identifies entity mentions in a collection of documents, and generates relevant relational statistics. The relations statisics are in terms of predicate argument structure.
License: Covered by the Illinois/NCSA Academic Use license. This allows individuals to use our software for non-commercial purposes, but restricts commercial use.

External Link: https://www.deftdocs.bbn.com/Shared Documents/MyHTML5/default.htm - Algorithms/Sentiment Social Context and Aspect/Attitude Extraction.htm
Description: Identifies the attitude (positive/negative) of an entity toward other entities within a sentence.

External Link: https://www.deftdocs.bbn.com/Shared Documents/MyHTML5/default.htm - Algorithms/Semantic Equivalence/Textual Similarity.htm
Description: Assigns scores between [0,1] indicating the similarity in meaning between two sentences.

External Link: https://www.deftdocs.bbn.com/Shared Documents/MyHTML5/default.htm - Algorithms/Textual Entailment/Lexical Entailment Resource.htm
Description: Identifies entailment relation (entails, contradicts, etc.) between a given pair of phrases.

External Link: https://www.deftdocs.bbn.com/Shared Documents/MyHTML5/default.htm - Algorithms/Coreference/Stanford's Coreference (Within Document).htm
Description: Identifies entity and verb coreferences within the input document.

External Link: https://www.deftdocs.bbn.com/Shared Documents/MyHTML5/default.htm - Algorithms/Semantic Equivalence/Semantic Textual Similarity.htm
Description: Calculates the semantic similarity between a pair of input text.

Software: Stanford's Labeled N-Ary Relations between Typed Text Spans (v1- Relation Extraction for KBP-Slot Filling)
External Link: https://www.deftdocs.bbn.com/Shared Documents/MyHTML5/default.htm - Algorithms/Document Relations/Stanford's Labeled N Ary Relations Between Typed Text Spans.htm
Description: Extracts binary relations from a document. Relations are pulled from an ontology (e.g. attended school).

Software: Stanford's Coreference (Cross document with resolution to KB)
External Link: https://www.deftdocs.bbn.com/Shared Documents/MyHTML5/default.htm - Algorithms/Coreference/Stanford's Coreference (Cross document with resolution to KB).htm
Description: Identifies entity coreferences across documents, and updates the KB with new found entities. System was designed for people and organizations.

External Link: https://www.deftdocs.bbn.com/Shared Documents/MyHTML5/default.htm - Algorithms/NLP Components/Stanford's Mention Detection (Within Document).htm
Description: Identifies and labels entity mentions within a document.

External Link: http://nlp.stanford.edu/software/CRF-NER.shtml
Description: Identifies named entites in text. Can be used with various models. As packaged by default with Stanford CoreNLP, 12 classes are recognized: DATE, TIME, DURATION, SET, NUMBER, ORDINAL, PERSON, LOCATION, ORGANIZATION, MONEY, PERCENT, MISC.

Description: Interfaces and integration framework for DEFT HLT algorithms and components.
